newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan arrests state-run bank chief.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan arrests state-run bank chief.

text.p: Pakistani police on Friday arrested M.B. Abbasi, president of the country's largest state-run bank, National Bank of Pakistan (NBP), police sources said.
They declined to give reasons for the arrest of Abbasi, who they said was picked up from his home in Karachi on government orders.
It was not immediately known if the arrest was linked with the sacking of prime minister Benazir Bhutto by President Farooq Leghari on November 5 on disputed charges of corruption and misrule.
